channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- IIS Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- IIS Server

item.title: CVE-2017-0055|2024-08-05T12:55:17.314Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- iis%20server
item.description: Microsoft Internet Information Server (IIS) in Windows Vista SP2; Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2; Windows 7 SP1; Windows 8.1; Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2; Windows RT 8.1; Windows 10 Gold, 1511, and 1607; and Windows Server 2016 allows remote attackers to perform cross-site scripting and run script with local user privileges via a crafted request, aka "Microsoft IIS Server XSS Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability."
